server.util

Class ServerGameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.definitions.GameMap
      • server.util.ServerGameMap

  • public class ServerGameMap
extends GameMap
    Class to represent the entire map Contains Hexes, ports, roads, settlemetns, cities, a radius, and a robber
    Author:
    Brennen
